trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties that manage the major and minor grids of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 주 버전과 부 모눈을 관리 하는 메서드와 속성을 제공 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the functionality for the grids on the chart, and is exposed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MajorGrid%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MinorGrid%2A> properties of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 차트에 대해 눈금의 기능을 제공 하며 사용 하 여 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MajorGrid%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MinorGrid%2A>각 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MinorGrid%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.MajorGrid%2A>

trans-unit.source: Major grid lines by default do not have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> properties set.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 주 눈금선 없는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A>속성 집합입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: When these properties for major grid lines are not set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control determines the appropriate values for grid lines automatically.
trans-unit.target: 주 눈금선에 대 한 이러한 속성은 설정 되어 있지 않으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤이 눈금선에 대 한 적절 한 값을 자동으로 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: The axis and its minor grid lines by default have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> properties set to **Auto** (0).
trans-unit.target: 축 및 기본적으로 해당 보조 눈금선의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A>속성으로 설정 **자동** (0).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: If axis labels or minor grid lines are enabled and these properties are not modified, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control automatically determines how often to draw the minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 축 레이블 또는 보조 눈금선이 사용 되 고 이러한 속성은 수정 되지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤에서 자동으로을 보조 눈금선을 그리는 방법을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: Axis grids: - Can be enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 축 눈금:-사용 하도록 설정 하거나 해제할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - Have a starting point that determines where they are first drawn.
trans-unit.target: 먼저 그려지는 곳을 결정 하는 시작점이 있어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - Display lines that can be set for style, width and color.
trans-unit.target: -스타일, 두께 및 색에 대해 설정할 수 있는 선을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - Can have either automatic intervals, or intervals that are set manually.
trans-unit.target: -자동 간격으로 또는 수동으로 설정 된 간격으로 가질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether major or minor grid lines are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 주 눈금선이 나 보조 눈금선이 사용 여부를 결정 하는 플래그를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Major and minor grids are visible when enabled, and not visible when disabled.
trans-unit.target: 주 및 부 표 사용 하도록 설정 하는 경우 표시 되 고 사용 하지 않도록 설정 하는 경우 표시 되지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks will not be displayed if disabled.
trans-unit.target: 눈금 표시는 사용할 수 없는 경우 표시 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can disable tick marks by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMark.TickMarkStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMarkStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMark.TickMarkStyle%2A>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMarkStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMarkStyle> 을</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMark.TickMarkStyle%2A> 설정 하 여 눈금 표시를 해제할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if enabled, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if disabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>설정 된 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 사용 하지 않도록 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for major grid objects and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for minor grid objects.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 주 그리드 개체에 대 한 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 보조 그리드 개체에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval between major or minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 주 눈금선이 나 보조 눈금선 간의 간격을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 축 레이블, 주 눈금 표시 및 주 눈금선에 대 한이 속성이 설정 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> at design time, or by assigning a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object to which the chart element, such as a grid line or tick mark, belongs.
trans-unit.target: 설정 되지 않은 경우-명시적으로 사용 하 여 기본적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>값을 할당 하거나 디자인 타임에 <xref:System.Double.NaN>런타임 시-이 속성의 실제 값으로 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>차트 요소 표 또는 눈금 표시와 같은 속해 있는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: The interval of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 보조 눈금 표시 및 눈금선의 간격에 영향을 받지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A>속성 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: The interval is measured in axis units, and determines how often an applicable chart element is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 축 단위로 측정 되며 간격과 적용 가능한 차트 요소를 그릴 하는 빈도 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a column chart has an X axis step of 1 (that is, 1, 2, 3, 4, and so forth); if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Interval%2A> property for the X axis to 2, an axis label will be displayed for every other column.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 세로 막대형 차트에 X 축 단계 1 (즉, 1, 2, 3, 4, 등); 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Interval%2A>속성이 2로 X 축에 대 한 축 레이블이 다른 모든 열에 대해 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: The same holds true for all applicable chart elements.
trans-unit.target: 모든 적용 가능한 차트 요소에도 마찬가지입니다.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if in the previous example strip lines were being used, with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A> of 0.5, and their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property was 2, a strip line would be displayed at 0.5, 2.5, 4.5, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 즉, 이전 예제에서는 줄무늬 사용 중인 경우와 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A>0.5, 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>속성은 2, 0.5, 2.5, 4.5, 및에 줄무늬 선을 표시 될 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set a chart element `Interval` property to zero, an interval will be automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>control.
trans-unit.target: 차트 요소를 설정 하면 `Interval` 속성을&0;으로 간격이 자동으로 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the interval between grid lines.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 눈금선 간의 간격을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is not set (<xref:System.Double>) for major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 값은 설정 되지 않습니다 (<xref:System.Double>) 주 눈금선에 대 한.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: For minor grid lines, the default value is zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 보조 눈금선에 대 한 기본값은 영 (0).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset of grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 눈금선의 오프셋을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 축 레이블, 주 눈금 표시 및 주 눈금선에 대 한이 속성이 설정 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set"at design time, or by assigning it a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the chart element, such as a grid line or a tick mark, belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 설정 되지 않은 경우-기본적으로 하거나, 명시적으로 디자인 타임에 "설정 안 함"을 지정 하 여 값을 할당 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>런타임 시-이 속성의 실제 값으로 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>눈금선이 또는 눈금 표시와 같은 차트 요소에 속하는 개체는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: The interval offset of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: 보조 눈금 표시 및 눈금선의 간격 오프셋 값에 의해 영향을 받지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property setting defines the units of measurement of the offset.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A>오프셋의 측정 단위를 정의 하는 속성을 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalOffsetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IntervalOffset can be a negative value.
trans-unit.target: IntervalOffset 음수 값일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the interval offset.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 간격 오프셋을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval offset type of major and minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 주 및 보조 눈금선의 간격 오프셋된 유형으로 설정 하거나 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 축 레이블, 주 눈금 표시 및 주 눈금선에 대 한이 속성이 설정 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 설정 되지 않은 경우-하거나 기본적으로, 디자인 타임에 "설정 안 함"을 명시적으로 지정 하 여 값을 할당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>런타임 시-이 속성의 실제 값으로 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>개체를 차트 요소-눈금선 나 눈금 예를 들어-에 속합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: The interval offset type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 보조 눈금 표시 및 눈금선의 간격 오프셋된 유형으로 영향을 받지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A>속성 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this interval offset type is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A> property will be used.
trans-unit.target: 로 설정 된 경우이 간격 오프셋 유형 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A>속성을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Grid.IntervalType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> 간격 유형을 나타내는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: By default it is not set for major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 주 눈금선에 대 한 설정 되지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value for minor grid lines is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 보조 눈금선에 대 한 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval type for major or minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 주 눈금선이 나 보조 눈금선의 간격 유형을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 축 레이블, 주 눈금 표시 및 주 눈금선에 대 한이 속성이 설정 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> at run time— the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 설정 되지 않은 경우-기본적으로 하거나, 명시적으로 디자인 타임에 "설정 안 함"를 사용 하 여 값을 할당 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>런타임 시-이 속성의 실제 값으로 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>개체를 차트 요소-눈금선 나 눈금 예를 들어-에 속합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffsetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: The interval type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 보조 눈금 표시 및 눈금선의 간격 유형을의 값에 의해 영향을 받지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Interval types can be set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>; the type of interval then depends on either the X-values or Y-values of the plotted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objects, depending on which axis the applicable elements belong to.
trans-unit.target: 간격 유형으로 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>; 간격 유형 다음 X 값 또는 그려진의 Y 값에 따라 달라 집니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>개체는 축에 따라 적용 가능한 요소에 속합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Setting the IntervalType property for a value axis will only have an effect if the values of the data points are <xref:System.DateTime> or `double` values.
trans-unit.target: 값 축만 영향을 미칠 데이터 요소의 값은 경우에 대 한 IntervalType 속성을 설정 <xref:System.DateTime>또는 `double` 값.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A> property of the plotted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType>.
trans-unit.target: 또한의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A>의 그려진 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType>나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType> 으로 설정 되어 있어야</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the IntervalType property for a categorical axis will only have an effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A> property, depending on the axis in question) of the plotted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object is either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType>.
trans-unit.target: 범주 축만 영향을 미칠 경우 IntervalType 속성 설정은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A>속성 (또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A>축에 따라 속성)의 표시 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>개체가 다음 중 하나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType>나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartValueType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Sunday is considered the first day of the week.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 일요일 시작 요일 것으로 간주 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> 간격 유형을 나타내는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: By default it is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines, by using the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 축 레이블, 주 눈금 표시 및 주 눈금선을 설정 하지 않으면 기본적으로 사용 하 여는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value for minor tick marks and grid lines is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 보조 눈금 표시 및 눈금선에 대 한 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of a grid.
trans-unit.target: 눈금의 선 색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LineColor property is used to specify the color of major and minor tick marks or grids.
trans-unit.target: LineColor 속성 표 또는 주 및 보조 눈금 표시의 색을 지정 하려면 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of a grid.
trans-unit.target: 눈금의 선 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LineDashStyle property can be used to specify the line style of major and minor tick marks or grids.
trans-unit.target: LineDashStyle 속성 표 또는 주 및 보조 눈금 표시의 선 스타일을 지정 하려면 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 단색, 점선 등 줄 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width of major and minor grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 주 및 보조 눈금선의 선 두께 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LineWidth property can be used to specify the line width, in pixels, of major and minor tick marks or grids.
trans-unit.target: 주 및 보조 눈금 표시 또는 표를 픽셀 단위로 선 두께 지정 하려면 LineWidth 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An i<xref uid="langword_csharp_nteger" name="nteger" href=""></xref> that represents the line width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: I<xref uid="langword_csharp_nteger" name="nteger" href=""> </xref> 선 두께 (픽셀)를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is one (1).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은&1;입니다.
